segments.text: Good morning , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , I have an appointment with Mr . Johnson at 10:00
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me , sir , but are you Mr . Richard of World Trading Company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Mr . Richard . Mr . Johnson is on his way to the office . He had just called and asked you to wait a minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like something to drink , sir ? Do you prefer coffee or tea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are , Mr . Richard . This is the cream and this is the sugar . If there ’ s anything else you ’ d like , please don ’ t hesitate to tell me .
segments.speaker: S1
